headline: Mr Wonderful Kevin O'Leary Says Bitcoin, Ethereum Enough To 'Capture The Promise' Of Crypto, Advises Against 'Irrelevant' Tokens
summary: Renowned investor Kevin O’Leary expressed his belief on Wednesday that owning only Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) can capture the majority of the cryptocurrency market’s volatility and yield. Don’t Chase ‘Irrelevant Tokens,’ Says ...
